segments.text: It covers an area of 75,000 square meters .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: It ’ s much larger than I expected . When was the plant set up ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: In the early 70s . We ’ ll soon be celebrating the 30th anniversary .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How many employees do you have in this plant ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: 500 . We ’ re running on three shifts .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Does the plant work with everything from the raw material to the finished product ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Our associates specializing in these fields make some access - ries . Well , here we ’ re at the production shop . Shall we start with the assembly line ?
segments.speaker: S2
